author: cms-sw
body: I accidentally merged new build rules in cmsdist. This PR is test new rules. cms-bot is also updated to check for rebuilds durring PR tests ( https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/commit/ef742ee7cd3c36c08d7307874b8d7a39f8b56ff7 )
title: [106X] [Do not Merge] BuildRules:  dummy PR to test new build rules
